website_summaries.verdict: A gargantuan timepiece that draws a mix of reactions and is certainly meant to be seen.
pros: Fits big and tall men very comfortably
Extremely large and very heavy, in typical Diesel chunky style
cons: Watch face is way too big for some to handle
Watch band may be a few links too small for some larger wrists

customer_reviews.title: Love love this watch
customer_reviews.text: Love love this watch. It is a big watch and I love it. I'm a female and I'm a big fan of big watches so of course I had to go for a mans watch but I'm perfectly fine with that. Had to take out like 15 links lol but it fits amazing. Just one of many big watches to come 😎😎😎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good watch but bad condition
customer_reviews.text: The pins attached to the straps have come off in less than 2weeks. It's a very good watch and really happy with th purchase until the pin on the straps came off. Really disappointed. Th batt on the watch was also not working and had to change them. Now I have to go and fix the damn strap. Paid almost $500 Singapore dollars and expected the watch to be in better condition.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Arulmani

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected; size as requested, looks and feels great! Outstanding service; fast and convenient!! A+++
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty watch. Gigantic. Like, enormous. Like, maybe you're over-compensating for your tiny, frail wrists. Or something.
customer_reviews.author: Horace

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I am legit in love with this beautiful watch. At first it picked it up and was shocked to how heavy it was, thinking it would be uncomfortable. But after wearing it for a week or so, I don't even realize it's there. I get compliments everywhere I go and I can't ever stop looking at it. The price for this watch is so cheap for what it is. Be warned that you with need to have it as a tight fit, because when it slams against the top on your hand, it hurts. Overall. I recommend this watch to anyone looking for a huge, heavy, and flashy watch.
customer_reviews.author: Alex cacace

customer_reviews.title: ** The size of a kiwi
customer_reviews.text: Great watch! And phenomenal quality! KEEP IN MIND that this watch is extremely large and heavy it gave my wrist a bruise from wearing the watch to much. Nonetheless great product and sexy design
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer 100%
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and looks amazing in person and on person. This brand is definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Donnita Robinson

customer_reviews.title: It's a great timepiece at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This thing is going to get you some attention. It's a great timepiece at a great price. It is VERY large and somewhat heavy, so if you're looking for something minimalist this is the opposite of what you're looking for. Overall it was a fantastic buy and I would get another one at this price.
customer_reviews.author: George Hunter

customer_reviews.title: fake cheap made
customer_reviews.text: Fake fake fake. Not a real diesel. Pins are cheap and quality is a joke u want a real diesel go buy the real one for $400
customer_reviews.author: Blake Goldie

customer_reviews.title: This is a very beautiful watch. The gold really pops and it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful watch. The gold really pops and it looks like it is made from excellent quality. It is way too big for my liking, so I will be sending it back. The 61 mm is way too big. Aside from that, it is an amazing watch.
customer_reviews.author: Halie R.

customer_reviews.title: Too much watch for my wrist
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I thought. Too much watch for me!
customer_reviews.author: Tee Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Diesel Men's DZ7287 Little Daddy Stainless
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, looks nice and the size is great....only drawback is the band is a little smaller than I expected, I usually have plenty of room with Diesel watches but this one is a tad tight.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Saurez

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch very classy
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch very classy. Looks like a paid 1000 dollars for this. My husband went crazy when he was it he fell in love. This is a must have men.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika Hiley

customer_reviews.title: Cool design, cheap feel
customer_reviews.text: Like the design and size, the band is pretty weak though. Had 2 of these watches and both bands broke. Cool look, just a little cheap on the feel. You’re call
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, bought this piece for my husband for Father's ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, bought this piece for my husband for Father's Day and he loved it. He always getting compliments on it when he wears it.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Willis

customer_reviews.title: Big face!!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, but I’m a small guy and the face is super big! I ordered the little daddy they must have sent me the big daddy 😂😂😂😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A FEMALES POINT OF VIEW
customer_reviews.text: ONLY DOWNFALL W/ THIS WATCH THE BAND WAS SMALL & I DID NOT LIKE THE STYLE OF THE BAND AS WELL . IT NEEDS AT LEAST 2 MORE LINKS TO FIT NICE AROUND A THICKER WRIST -- THE BAND THAT WOULD LOOK NICE W/ IT SHOULD BE FROM MR DADDYS WATCH (DZ7399) .... ITS MORE APPEALING TO THE EYE THAN THE ONE THATS ON THIS LITTLE DADDY WATCH.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Little too flashy to wear everyday
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Little too flashy to wear everyday, which is why I bought the leather band version as well. Will update any issues regarding function or durability.
customer_reviews.author: avg.joe

customer_reviews.title: Band turn color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch a couple of months ago and the band has turn color already , this is very upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it I love it I love it. Very nice always gets attention. Great price highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product with a pretty good price, delivery in perfect compliance, remain very pleased to be a gift I wanted to and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Velez Fajardo

customer_reviews.title: I love my little daddy it's a kinda of heavy but ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my little daddy it's a kinda of heavy but you get used to it I've been wearing it all day and I have hardly noticed
customer_reviews.author: Christopher corey Morris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product as shown in the page for a very good price !! I recommend, and hope you enjoy like me !
customer_reviews.author: RONISVALDO RIBEIRO DOS SANTOS

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a Christmas gift for my 6'5 boyfriend and let me tell you it is humongous even on him! Beautiful and very masculine! Go diesel!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. W.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's too large! It's a real conversation piece but the face of it is way too big!
customer_reviews.author: Muteteli Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, my third Diesel watch; is absolutely a beautiful watch
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift
customer_reviews.text: Husband loved it and I loved the price. Same watch at Macy was a hundred dollar more. Crazy!! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Mrs.Fly

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is gorgeous and really nice quality. I bought it as a gift and I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: aryn fomran

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like the watch. I am unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this watch ...I need to change the product because water has entered inside. What can I do to change it?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch
customer_reviews.text: Very Dynamic look to this time piece. Get loads of comments
customer_reviews.author: Dana Mattos

customer_reviews.title: NO REGRETS AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: I loved my watch. Great quality, big and heavy, just the way I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks sick! I get so many compliments on it every time I wear it!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: It stands out and has a pretty shine to it
customer_reviews.text: First day wearing it, I received more complements than all my other watches. It stands out and has a pretty shine to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice watch but it came cracked but i got it fixed so its a nice buy
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch
customer_reviews.text: Amazing watch scored on Black Friday for only $150 definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: DragonZord

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! My boyfriend really love his watch!! He said it was perfect size and shape! He also admire the gold tone of the watch!
customer_reviews.author: Catrina Williams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY BF LOVED HIS BDAY GIFT!!! EVERYONE BOTH MALE AND FEMALE GIVE HIM COMPLIMENTS! ITS GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemery

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loved this watch!!! Be careful though, because when you purchase it from amazon, you do not have the warranty from Diesal. Within two month a screw came out and we went to diesel to repair it, but they turned us away because we did not buy the watch from them. Bummer. WE eventually got it fixed, but huge 'good to know' to future purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika Magloire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, it is a little bigger then I thought but still a great statement piece.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Arora

customer_reviews.title: Best big watches out there
customer_reviews.text: Diesel watches are some of the best big watches out there. I collect watches and haven't got a bad one yet. Only bad thing is the last 2 I've bought needed batteries within a week.
customer_reviews.author: doublestar15

customer_reviews.title: I totally love my new watch
customer_reviews.text: Right on time , always a day before than what is said . I totally love my new watch.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Corado

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTTTTTTT
customer_reviews.text: It's just perfect , my husband loves it, looks better on person
customer_reviews.author: pamela silvestre

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. It exceeded my expectation when I recieved it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent watch. I really like the way it stands out. I already am getting compliments on the watch.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It was a great valentines gift. And I received it super fast.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Not a day goes by that I don't receive a compliment on this watch, I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Show off but to big
customer_reviews.text: The watch came fast and I already am receiving a lot of compliments but the only things is it's a little to big.
customer_reviews.author: Rashard Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I am sooo in love with my watch
customer_reviews.text: I am sooo in love with my watch!!!! I bought it for myself as a Christmas present to me, & it's amazing! I had to get some links taken out for it to fit my wrist, & it's gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Brown

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice and stylish but very big
customer_reviews.text: If you are familiar with Diesel watches then go for it. If you are not, the watch is very big. It is a nice and stylish but very big.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Moore

customer_reviews.title: Super beautiful and luxurious
customer_reviews.text: This watch is so beautiful you cannot escape compliments and enthusiastic comments. I love big watches but this one is really big and gives you special feeling of luxury and "might". I recommend this for ever man who likes pleasure and compliments...
customer_reviews.author: IBS

customer_reviews.title: still a very nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as the other Diesel watches, and when you really examine the inside of the watch (the side that's not visible to people) you can see where they didn't paint certain area. Nothing major, still a very nice watch!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Reamon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch. It fit well and is good quality. Can wear it casually or wear it formally. I would recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied! Only thing is it did not come with ...
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied! Only thing is it did not come with a white case. Was an identical one but in black. Other than that it was a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Vnucak

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality time
customer_reviews.text: This watch was everything i envisioned it to be. Great Quality time piece
customer_reviews.author: jamarr robinson

customer_reviews.title: So nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband who has a very high taste and he is loving it. He gets compliments from friends whenever its on his wrist. The good part of it is he tells them, "my wife bought it for me from Amazon". That is advertisement enough.
customer_reviews.author: McLord

customer_reviews.title: Bought you watch April 17 2014 Hours without damage. ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought you watch April 17 2014 Hours without damage. Wet when washing his hands, now they sweat. I demand an explanation!
customer_reviews.author: Anatoly Klyashko

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Nice beautiful watch, but it's really too big. If you are a small guy like me, you should consider buying this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Agus

product_meta.title: Diesel Little Daddy DZ7287
product_meta.description:
* Watch Sizing Guide
 * Bring a major look into your game play with this stunning watch from Diesel®!
 * Gold-tone stainless steel case.
 * Gold-tone stainless steel bracelet with double push-button closure.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement. 
 * Gold-tone, pyramid-textured dial features three subdials, secondary time clock, date display window, and Diesel detailing.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Water resistant 3 ATM/30 meters.
 * Display case included.
 * Imported.






PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :5.31 x 5.12 x 5.31 inches; 7.21 Ounces
 * Item model number :DZ7287
 * Department :Mens
 * Batteries :1 LR44 batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :August 17, 2013
 * Manufacturer :Diesel
 * ASIN :B00CRZCRSE

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #510,656 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #4022 inMen's Wrist Watches 
    *  #122 inMen's Contemporary & Designer Watches 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars195 ratings 

 * Watch Sizing Guide
 * Bring a major look into your game play with this stunning watch from Diesel®!
 * Gold-tone stainless steel case.
 * Gold-tone stainless steel bracelet with double push-button closure.
 * Three-hand analog display with quartz movement. 
 * Gold-tone, pyramid-textured dial features three subdials, secondary time clock, date display window, and Diesel detailing.
 * Chronograph functionality.
 * Water resistant 3 ATM/30 meters.
 * Display case included.
 * Imported.
feature_bullets: Case size: 61mm; Band size: 24mm; quartz movement with 3-hand analog display, date window, and 3 chronograph subdials; mineral crystal face
Gold-tone plated stainless steel case with screw accents on bezel; monochrome gold-tone textured dial with dual time zone displays
Gold-tone plated stainless steel bracelet with deployment-clasp closure
Water resistant to 100 feet (30 M): withstands splashes or brief immersion in water, but not suitable for swimming or showering
This product is authentic and sold directly from the brand manufacturer to Amazon
